reviews.content: Doesn't seem to show any care or concern.  I  fractured my tibia and tore a ligament but she still refused me any strong pain medication.  I understand people abuse these, and also know the risks of addiction but I am in incredible pain :( She seems to not want to work with the patient to find something that works for them, she would rather just make a decision and move on to the next to get through her day.  Extremely disappointed and will be finding a new doctor.
